Hello World. Yu (朱瑜) is here. A Software Developer who is passionate with Frontend Development. I'm currently working at Liebherr, responsible for the developing and maintaining of the 🛒 Liebherr Appliances eCommerce Website.

For Frontend Development, the critical point is, to understand the needs of the user, then rendering the data as friendly as possible. UI/UX design matters to me and I am a big fan of Minimalist Design. I like to think about how users would use the software in different scenarios. I hope the software I developed helps users solve their problems efficiently and satisfactorily.

I make lofi beats for developers. Hopefully the soundtracks I made can help people concentrate and decrease the stress while coding. Find me on ☘️ Spotify, 🍎 AppleMusic, and ☁️ SoundCloud by searching Lofi Coder.
